attributes.action: Make the elderly retake their driving test every 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As people age, their responses slow down, and therefore they become less safe on the road. I would like to see every person 60 and over be forced to retake their driving test every 5 years, as this would eliminate dangerous elderly drivers from being able to drive when they become a risk to others on the road
